text: Nalo lisisi, liali lia Abaana abafwilwa babili, mulitokho elo, ne hasi walio khwaliho nende libishibo liabu, ne samwana yali omundu omulayi, kho Nyasaye wuwo yenya mbu bakubuye mana berusilie abeene libishilo liabu, etso nitsimbabaasi tsirula khu Nyasaye wuwo. Ne shekholele kano khubunyali bwanje tawe . Obo nibo abwatoto bwa kalia akokhayilwe okhwifwila ninaasi
